problem.markdown:
>>What are two reasons for uploading Excel reports to Power BI?<<
[ ] To provide a backup solution for the Excel report [x] To gain access to a more sophisticated visualization element. [x] To easily share the report between users. [ ] To enable faster calculations of pivot charts.
[explanation] Power BI gives you access to more visualization element than the ones in Excel. Tree-map visualization is one example. In addition, by uploading your reports to Power BI, you can easily share the dashboard you created with other users. [explanation]
problem.p: What are two reasons for uploading Excel reports to Power BI?
